bibl.title: Some Early Ptolemaic Tax Receipts from Cambridge University Library.
bibl.note: Edition of four tax receipts coming from the Theban region. - 1. O. Cambr. Inv. sup. 322 (29 April 249 B.C.). - 2. Inv. sup. 323 (285-222 B.C.). - 3. Inv. sup. 330 (9 September 249 B.C.). - 4. Inv. sup. 334 (2 February 236 B.C.).
bibl.seg: Brian Muhs, Some Early Ptolemaic Tax Receipts from Cambridge University Library.
Fayza Haikal (ed.), Mélanges offerts à Ola el-Aguizy = Bibliothèque d'étude. 164 (Le Caire, 2015) pp. 303-309, 4 fac-sim.

Edition of four tax receipts coming from the Theban region. - 1. O. Cambr. Inv. sup. 322 (29 April 249 B.C.). - 2. Inv. sup. 323 (285-222 B.C.). - 3. Inv. sup. 330 (9 September 249 B.C.). - 4. Inv. sup. 334 (2 February 236 B.C.).
